pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 彼らが目を覚ましたとき、彼らの傍らにあった石を見つけた。
lessons.english: When they woke up they saw a stone lying next to them.

lessons.japanese: 彼は読書をし、その傍らで妻が手袋を編んでいた。
lessons.english: He sat reading, with his wife knitting a pair of gloves beside him.
